lead_paragraph: Former England manager Steve McClaren has expressed sympathy for Sam Allardyce who left his job as national team coach on Tuesday following a sting by the Daily Telegraph newspaper.

headline.print_headline: McClaren Criticises Lack of Privacy Following Allardyce Departure
headline.main: McClaren Criticises Lack of Privacy Following Allardyce Departure

snippet: Former England manager Steve McClaren has expressed sympathy for Sam Allardyce who left his job as national team coach on Tuesday following a sting by the Daily Telegraph newspaper....
